sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import Header from '../../components/Header'; import SvgIcons from '../../components/svg'; import Footer from '../../components/Footer'; import Popup from '../../components/popup'; import FormPopup from '../../components/FormPopup'; export const ProductOne = () => { const [popup, setPopup] = useState(false); const [fpopup, setFpopup] = useState(false); const imageUrl = `${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/images/gradient-bg.png`; const bgImageStyle = { backgroundImage: `url(${imageUrl})`, backgroundSize: 'cover', backgroundPosition: 'center', }; const imageUrlThree = `${process.env.PUBLIC_URL}/images/pricingOneBackground.png`; const bgImageStyleThree = { backgroundImage: `url(${imageUrlThree})`, backgroundSize: 'cover', backgroundPosition: 'center', }; return (
{/* 1ST SECTION */}

Animated Video Creation

Transform you ideas into animated videos with our Animated Video Creation Tool

Easier

Faster

Reliable

setFpopup(!fpopup)} className=' flex items-center justify-center bg-[#5C57C3] p-3 px-5 w-[280px] rounded-md cursor-pointer' > Talk to our Experts
{/* 2ND SECTION */}

How Our Animated Video Generation Tool Works?

Our Animated Video Creation tool empowers users to produce stunning animations with ease, without the need for AI. Designed for both beginners and experienced animators, the tool features an intuitive drag-and-drop interface that allows you to create animations by combining characters, backgrounds, and props from an extensive library. You can customize scenes, add text overlays, and incorporate sound effects and background music to enhance your animations. With a variety of templates and editing options, such as transitions and special effects, you can craft professional-quality animations tailored to your needs. Ideal for marketers, educators, and content creators, this tool simplifies the animation process, making it accessible and efficient to create engaging, visually appealing animated videos that captivate your audience.

{/* 3RD SECTION */}

Product Features

Easily Customizable

Voice Over Integeration

High Quality Output

Intuitive Interface

{/* 4TH SECTION */}

More Products

We offer a variety of Services that you can test out, all these services are free for you to test out and generate your very own professional video in few simple steps

{' '}

Text to Video

Transform your text into engaging videos with just a few clicks. Enter your content, choose a style, and watch it turn into a professional video. Try it now and create your own dynamic visuals.

setPopup(!popup)} className=' flex items-center justify-center bg-[#5C57C3] p-3 px-5 mt-5 ml-auto mr-auto w-[143px] rounded-md cursor-pointer' > Join the Waitlist

Video Menu Generation

Generate custom video menus to organize and present your content seamlessly. With easy steps, create a sleek, user-friendly interface for your videos. Try it now to enhance your video presentation.

setPopup(!popup)} className=' flex items-center justify-center bg-[#5C57C3] p-3 px-5 mt-5 ml-auto mr-auto w-[143px] rounded-md cursor-pointer' > Join the Waitlist

Image to Video

Convert your images into stunning videos effortlessly. Simply upload your photos, add transitions and effects, and produce a captivating video in minutes. Try it now to bring your visuals to life.

setPopup(!popup)} className=' flex items-center justify-center bg-[#5C57C3] p-3 px-5 mt-5 ml-auto mr-auto w-[143px] rounded-md cursor-pointer' > Join the Waitlist
{' '}

Conventional Video Production

Produce high-quality conventional videos with our easy-to-use platform. Choose from templates, add your footage, and customize it to suit your needs. Try it now to create professional-grade videos.

setPopup(!popup)} className=' flex items-center justify-center bg-[#5C57C3] p-3 px-5 mt-5 ml-auto mr-auto w-[143px] rounded-md cursor-pointer' > Join the Waitlist

Food export Assistant

Our Food Export Assistant AI Chatbot helps you discover the best markets for your food exports worldwide. Gain insights into demand, trends, and regulations in target countries, streamlining your export planning

setPopup(!popup)} className=' flex items-center justify-center bg-[#5C57C3] p-3 px-5 mt-5 ml-auto mr-auto w-[143px] rounded-md cursor-pointer' > Join the Waitlist
{/* 5TH SECTION */}
{fpopup && } {popup && }
); };
